overview: Ibiza...carefree, sun soaked days of bronze skin, beautiful topless beaches and uninhibited sex. One would think you died and went to heaven. And after Steve fakes his death it's where he plans to hide out until his wife can collect the insurance money and join him in paradise. But things don't always go according to plan and the insurance company isn't willing to pay for Steve to play. Now it's a race to stay one step ahead of them in this adult playground...get Ibiza Undressed and see how much fun hide and seek can be!
tagline: Get away from it all. Get away with it all.
title: Ibiza Undressed
